snippet: A frequent guest on the news channel, Ms. Cheney will "offer commentary across all Fox News platforms" and fill in for some Fox News hosts.
abstract: A frequent guest on the news channel, Ms. Cheney will "offer commentary across all Fox News platforms" and fill in for some Fox News hosts.
lead_paragraph: Liz Cheney, the daughter of former Vice President Dick Cheney, is joining Fox News Channel as a paid contributor and substitute host, the channel confirmed Friday.

headline.main: Fox News Hires Liz Cheney as Analyst and Substitute Host
